ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Brief Intro
ygData.msgSnippet: Welcome :) What server are you on? ... ===== ~~~~~~~~~ And on the eighth day God said, O.K. Murphy. You take over. http://home.comcast.net/~melanieroark
ygData.messageBody:
Welcome :) What server are you on?

--- "B.J.W." <hpemrys@...> wrote:

> Well Met all,
>
> My main is a 58 Barbarian Shamaness, followed by a
> 53 Wood Elf Druid,
> then a 50 Dark Elf Necromancer. I have 16 toons
> altogether. 2
> accounts.
>
> Been playing 2 years, with long breaks within that
> time.
>
> I grew up table-top roleplaying so EQ is a natural
> progression. I
> love quests and sharing info with other players.
>
> I play on an older machine (soon to change) so some
> zones/group
> situations are frustrating for me.
>
> Hope to share with u guys in the future!
>
> May your mana be plentiful,
> Witchbread
>
>


=====
~~~~~~~~~

And on the eighth day God said, "O.K. Murphy. You take over."
http://home.comcast.net/~melanieroark
